members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item this setting applies to

members.name: preorderRequest
members.doc: Whether this line item purchase was made as part of a purchase that includes preorder items.

members.name: paymentGatewayTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments)

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc: Payment method used for this order

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment provider (e.g., PayPal, Square, Stripe) transaction ID

members.name: refundableByPaymentProvider
members.doc: Whether order can be refunded by payment provider (manually or automatic)

members.name: sendPickupReadyEmail
members.doc: when true pickup ready email will be sent to the buyer for all orders with pickup delivery

members.name: sendShippingConfirmationEmail
members.doc: when true shipping confirmation email will be sent to the buyer for all orders with shipment delivery

members.name: sendPickupReadyEmail
members.doc: when true pickup ready email will be sent to the buyer for all orders with pickup delivery

members.name: sendShippingConfirmationEmail
members.doc: when true shipping confirmation email will be sent to the buyer for all orders with shipment delivery

members.name: externalOrderId
members.doc: Reference to an order ID from an external system, as defined in channelInfo (e.g., eBay or Amazon)

members.name: externalOrderUrl
members.doc: URL to the order in the external system, as defined in channelInfo (e.g., eBay or Amazon)

members.name: type
members.doc: Sales channel that submitted the order

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (to which the fulfillment will be related).

members.name: translatedTitle
members.doc: The title translated according to the buyer language

members.name: value
members.doc: Free text that the customer entered in the custom field during the checkout process

members.name: fileId
members.doc: id of the secure file in media

members.name: _id
members.doc:
Unique event ID.
Allows clients to ignore duplicate webhooks.

members.name: entityEventSequence
members.doc:
A sequence number defining the order of updates to the underlying entity.
For example, given that some entity was updated at 16:00 and than again at 16:01,
it is guaranteed that the sequence number of the second update is strictly higher than the first.
As the consumer, you can use this value to ensure that you handle messages in the correct order.
To do so, you will need to persist this number on your end, and compare the sequence number from the
message against the one you have stored. Given that the stored number is higher, you should ignore the message.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Assumes actions are also always typed to an entity_type
Example: wix.stores.catalog.product, wix.bookings.session, wix.payments.transaction

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ID of the entity associated with the event.

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
This is top level to ease client code dispatching of messages (switch on entity_fqdn+slug)
This is although the created/updated/deleted notion is duplication of the oneof types
Example: created/updated/deleted/started/completed/email_opened

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc:
Whether the event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application
(for example, GDPR).

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc:
Since platformized APIs only expose PATCH and not PUT we can't assume that the fields sent from the client are the actual diff.
This means that to generate a list of changed fields (as opposed to sent fields) one needs to traverse both objects.
We don't want to impose this on all developers and so we leave this traversal to the notification recipients which need it.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Fulfillment ID (auto generated upon fulfillment creation).

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Information about the line items in the fulfilled order.

members.name: fulfillmentId
members.doc: ID of the newly created fulfillment.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: index
members.doc: Line item ID (mirrors the line item index of the order).

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Line item quantity.
On creation, if this parameter isn't passed, the new fulfillment will automatically include all items of this line item that have not already been linked to a fulfillment.
If the order does not have the requested quantity of line items available to add to this fulfillment, the fulfillment will not be created and an error will be returned.
This property will always have a value when returned.

members.name: shippingProvider
members.doc:
Shipping provider. Using the following shipping providers will allow for autofilling the tracking link:
* `fedex`
* `ups`
* `usps`
* `dhl`
* `canadaPost`

members.name: trackingLink
members.doc: Tracking link - autofilled if using a predefined shipping provider, otherwise provided on creation.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: Line item custom text field entry

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount applied for this line item

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc: Line item fulfillerId from stores fulfillers. No value equals self fulfilled

members.name: index
members.doc: Line item ID (auto-generated, stable within this order only)

members.name: mediaItem
members.doc: Primary media for preview of the line item

members.name: productId
members.doc: Line item product ID (optional for POS orders)

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax applied for this line item

members.name: translatedName
members.doc: Product name, translated into the customer's language

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price set for this line item

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Total price charged to the customer (per line item) after computation of quantity and discount

members.name: _id
members.doc: Media ID (for media items previously saved in Wix Media)

members.name: altText
members.doc: Alternative text for presentation when media cannot be displayed

members.name: identity
members.doc: The identification type and identity data.

members.name: activities
members.doc: Log of updates related to the order.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether or not the order was archived.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language for communication with the buyer. Defaults to the site language.
For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the buyer selected.

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted this order.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for the pricing of this order in [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#List_of_ISO_4217_currency_codes) format.

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc: Order's current fulfillment status (whether the order received a tracking number or was delivered/picked up).

members.name: lastUpdated
members.doc: Date and time of latest update.

members.name: number
members.doc: Order number displayed in the owner's store (auto-generated).

members.name: numericId
members.doc:
Orders unique numeric ID.
Primarily used for sorting and filtering when crawling all orders.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store.

members.name: refund
members.doc: will be defined if order was refunded

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store

members.name: number
members.doc: ID displayed in the owner's store (auto generated)

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation)

members.name: read
members.doc: Whether the order was read by the store owner

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store

members.name: isOffline
members.doc: means that order paid with cash, such orders might be not paid

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation)

members.name: originalTotal
members.doc: Total price charged when order placed, this value isn't affected by refunds

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store

members.name: number
members.doc: ID displayed in the owner's store (auto generated)

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation)

members.name: read
members.doc: Whether the order was read by the store owner

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset since the beginning of the collection

members.name: items
members.doc: Requested number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: Requested offset since the beginning of the collection

members.name: externalRefund
members.doc: Whether refund was made externally (on the payment provider's side).

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Payment provider transaction ID. Used to find refund transaction info on the payment provider's side.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund, given by user (optional).

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc: Payment method used for this order

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code of provided shipping option. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"`.

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details (when this object describes pickup).

members.name: shipmentDetails
members.doc: Shipment details (when this object describes shipment).

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details (when this object describes pickup).

members.name: shipmentDetails
members.doc: Shipment details (when this object describes shipment).

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price.

members.name: cycleNumber
members.doc: Current cycle number. For example, if the subscription is in the 3rd month of a 4-month subscription, the value will be `3`.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before tax.

members.name: email
members.doc: New email address for billing and shipping info.

members.name: email
members.doc: New email address for billing and shipping info.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Tax type.
+ `CPF`: For individual tax payers.
+ `CNPJ`: For corporations.
